channel.title: CVE Feed for MagePeople Team -- Event Manager for WooCommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MagePeople Team -- Event Manager for WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2024-49703|2024-10-24T12:11:18.395Z -- magepeople%20team -- event%20manager%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in MagePeople Team Event Manager for WooCommerce allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Event Manager for WooCommerce: from n/a through 4.2.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-43138|2024-08-13T11:35:20.843Z -- magepeople%20team -- event%20manager%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in MagePeople Team Event Manager for WooCommerce allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Event Manager for WooCommerce: from n/a through 4.2.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-43138|2024-08-13T13:35:49.117Z -- magepeople%20team -- event%20manager%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in MagePeople Team Event Manager for WooCommerce allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Event Manager for WooCommerce: from n/a through 4.2.1.
